:::Andromeda/Hurricane/Treadshot/Bluestreak:::

::Andromeda sees the body of SnowCat::
Andromeda: Goodbye, friend.  Your life was far too short... Ramulus, lets get 
back to base and into some CR's, before we lose anyone else.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------
::Treadshot and Hurricane hear Zardus' trasmission and run out to the battle::
Treadshot: Its time to kill!
Hurricane: Yeah, thats what im talking about!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------
::Bluestreak begins to heal::
